gov.sandia.cognition.framework.io

Class SerializedModelHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.sandia.cognition.framework.io.SerializedModelHandler

  • public class SerializedModelHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    The SerializedModelHandler class implements some utility methods for dealing with models that have been serialized using the Java serialization API.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Justin Basilico

      • readObjectFromFile

        public static java.lang.Object readObjectFromFile(java.io.File file)
                                           throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                                  java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                                                  java.io.IOException
        Reads a serialized Java Object from the given File.
        Parameters:
        file - The File to read from.
        Returns:
        The Object read from the given File.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - If the file was not found.
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - If the class that the Object or one of its internal fields cannot be found.
        java.io.IOException - If there is any other type of error reading from the file.
